Topic.Title: @$9.18 is DELL quietly going out of business?

Message.Msg: That was the point that there is no value asigned to the legacy franchise. The other thing to note is that 10B value doesn't account for ALL the acquistions some were undisclosed and not included in the @10B figure. (e.g. Sonicwall was mentioned in a number of articles @1B - 1.5B) nor would they need to be discounted 50% in fact some are more valuable now then when acquired.

Topic.Title: @$9.18 is DELL quietly going out of business?

Message.Msg: appears that way. not sure if can be salvaged. similar to Compaq situation many years ago.

Message.Title: Swing Trading Long Dell Inc. on reversal upward pattern..
Message.Msg: Good Afternoon: Apocalypse for PC era will wait for a while in my humble opinion. PC and laptops are still good tools in factories, offices and nice toys at homes; servers are the heart that store in the cloud and pumps data towards wide world web in our information technology society. DELL manufactures Pc´s,Laptops tablets and servers, but it also manufactures printers, and a wide range of electronic devices, so.. for me is well diversified in its products that reach new and old customers every day. Turn around stories won´t work from one day to another, but it seems to me that DELL´s CEO is working very hard to get a new growing story for his company, Tech. speaking DELL is trading right now in an oversold condition and with divergences between market price and Chaikin Money flow, so it could be ready for an upward reversal with stockastic oscillator crossing in the low band. I recommend starting long positions right now to get into this undervalued company before take off. Have a nice day Longs.
